title: Progress Threshold
content:
Features, beings , and locations can have progress thresholds. These are indicated by a value in a blue box in the upper-right corner of the card's text box.

When a card has progress on it equal to or exceeding its progress threshold, the card clears .

  • Some path cards don’t have progress thresholds. These cards can still receive progress, but they will never clear because of them.
  • Some progress thresholds are marked with the Ranger symbol. These cards are cleared when every Rangers’ token is on the card.
